data.name: Apocalypse
data.description: The first mutant, En Sabah Nur, Apocalypse has arrived! With his incalculable power he destroys enemy defenses and grants Safeguard and Immunity to his allies.

starItems.name: Apocalypse
starItems.description: The first mutant, En Sabah Nur, Apocalypse has arrived! With his incalculable power he destroys enemy defenses and grants Safeguard and Immunity to his allies.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to that target and clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Drain.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to that target and clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to that target and clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
Heal for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target

4.description:
Heal for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

6.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.
Heal for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to that target and clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character.

6.nextUpgrade:

7.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
Heal for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to that target and clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
7.nextUpgrade:
Attack targets adjacent to primary target for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary and secondary targets

item.name: Apocalypse's Basic Awakened Ability Material
item.description: Used to further upgrade character abilities.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.

8.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
Heal for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to that target and clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing.

Redistribute your total squad health evenly.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain.

Redistribute your total squad health evenly.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>, to self, all <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> allies, and <color=#86e619>2</color> non-<color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> allies with the highest Damage

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain.

Redistribute your total squad health evenly.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>, to self, all <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> allies, and <color=#86e619>2</color> non-<color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> allies with the highest Damage.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain

Attack primary and adjacent target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain.

Redistribute your total squad health evenly.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>, to self, all <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> allies, and <color=#86e619>2</color> non-<color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> allies with the highest Damage.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>, to the primary target

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>.
Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>260%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain.

Redistribute your total squad health evenly.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>, to self, all <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> allies, and <color=#86e619>2</color> non-<color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> allies with the highest Damage.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Clear all negative effects from self, all <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> allies, and <color=#86e619>2</color> other allies with the highest damage

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>.
Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain.

Redistribute your total squad health evenly.

Do the following for this character, all <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> allies, and <color=#86e619>2</color> non-<color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> allies with the highest Damage:
 > Clear all negative effects.
 > Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self, all <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> allies, and <color=#86e619>2</color> other allies with the highest damage

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>.

Do the following for this character, all <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> allies, and <color=#86e619>2</color> non-<color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> allies with the highest Damage:

 > Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
7.nextUpgrade: Apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#9055ff>Vulnerable</color>, +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, and +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to primary and adjacent targets

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be Blocked or counterattacked.

1.description:
This character cannot be revived.
The Speed of this character and each ally can only be reduced by <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> chance to Counterattack + <color=#86e619>15%</color> for each <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> or <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> ally.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus for each ally.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health
Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Accuracy
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, all allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Accuracy

6.description:
This character cannot be revived.
The Speed of this character and each ally can only be reduced by <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
At the start of any match, enemy characters cannot spawn with <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>.
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>, and <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On any Turn, Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>1%</color> of this character's Max Health.
On <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>, then Heal for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Lower the Focus of the first enemy to take the first turn of the match by <color=#86e619>200%</color>.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health for the first time:
 > Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>50%</color>.
 > Heal for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>3</color> turns.

Gain +<color=#86e619>70%</color> Max Health. All allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage. All allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.
Gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> chance to Counterattack + <color=#86e619>15%</color> for each <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> or <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> ally.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus for each ally.
Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Accuracy and In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, all allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Accuracy.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage and <color=#86e619>60%</color> of target's Max Health.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> and passives that trigger when a character drops below a certain Health.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to that target and clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
Clear <color=#fff568>Empowered</color>.

1.description:
This character cannot be revived.
The Speed of this character and each ally can only be reduced by <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> chance to Counterattack + <color=#86e619>15%</color> for each <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> or <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> ally.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus for each ally.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health
Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Accuracy
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, all allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Accuracy

2.description:
This character cannot be revived.
The Speed of this character and each ally can only be reduced by <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> chance to Counterattack + <color=#86e619>15%</color> for each <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> or <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> ally.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus for each ally.
Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Accuracy.
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, all allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Accuracy.
2.nextUpgrade:
On <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>, then Heal for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health
Lower the Focus of the first enemy to take the first turn of the match by <color=#86e619>200%</color>.

3.description:
This character cannot be revived.
The Speed of this character and each ally can only be reduced by <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

On <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>, then Heal for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Lower the Focus of the first enemy to take the first turn of the match by <color=#86e619>200%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus for each ally.
Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Accuracy.
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, all allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Accuracy.
3.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>, and <color=#fff568>Charged</color>
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health for the first time, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>50%</color>, and heal for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health

4.description:
This character cannot be revived.
The Speed of this character and each ally can only be reduced by <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>, and <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>, then Heal for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Lower the Focus of the first enemy to take the first turn of the match by <color=#86e619>200%</color>.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health for the first time:
 > Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>50%</color>.
 > Heal for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> chance to Counterattack + <color=#86e619>15%</color> for each <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> or <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> ally.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus for each ally.
Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Accuracy.
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, all allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Accuracy.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health
At the start of any match, enemy characters cannot spawn with <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>

5.description:
This character cannot be revived.
The Speed of this character and each ally can only be reduced by <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

At the start of any match, enemy characters cannot spawn with <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>.
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>, and <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>, then Heal for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health for the first time:
 > Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>50%</color>.
 > Heal for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> chance to Counterattack + <color=#86e619>15%</color> for each <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> or <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> ally.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus for each ally.
Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Accuracy.
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, all allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Accuracy.
5.nextUpgrade:
On any Turn, Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>1%</color> of this character's Max Health
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health for the first time, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>3</color> turns
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health and Damage
All allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health and Damage

6.description:
This character cannot be revived.
The Speed of this character and each ally can only be reduced by <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
At the start of any match, enemy characters cannot spawn with <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>.
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>, and <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

 > Heal for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>3</color> turns.

Gain +<color=#86e619>70%</color> Max Health. All allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage. All allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.
Gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> chance to Counterattack + <color=#86e619>15%</color> for each <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> or <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> ally.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus for each ally.
Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Accuracy and In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, all allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Accuracy.
